audio.processing.modulation

Interface LFO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SinusoidalLFO, TriangularLFO

    public interface LFO
    This is simply an interface class which allows lists a set of public abstract methods contained in classes sinusoidalLFO and triangularLFO. While it was possible not to use an interface class, the use of an interface here enables the use of different types of low frequency oscillators, and allows for future development of new types of oscillation patterns, such as logarithmic, sawtooth etc. Also, other non-audio related classes and programs could use this interface.
    See Also:
    SinusoidalLFO, TriangularLFO, VariableDelay, VariableDelayEffect
